titles.title: Providing for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Eleventh Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/27/2008--Passed House without amendment. Provides for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the 111th Congress to be printed as a House document, including 3,000 additional copies.
